about_me.des: I am a software architect focused on backend. I have experience in Microservices architectures developed in Java (Spring Framework - Boot, Cloud), Kotlin and kafka (async). I am always very focused on looking for infrastructure level solutions (Camunda for orchestration or OPA to handle authorization policies) rather than custom implementations. Any infrastructure level solution is usually better than a custom implementation.

projects.kace-sma-tools: Useful scripts and ideas for Quest Kace Systems Management Appliace (K1000).
projects.k1000-database-queries: A collection of MySQL queries for the Dell KACE K1000 appliance.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
